titles.title: To permit States to establish programs using unemployment funds to assist unemployed individuals in becoming self-employed.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: 3/1/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Labor to permit States to establish and operate self-employment programs that use State unemployment funds to assist unemployed individuals (who are otherwise entitled to State unemployment compensation) in becoming self-employed.
